mapper.select: select seats_ids from mtime_order_t where field_id = #{id}

select o.UUID ,film_name, begin_time, cinema_name, seats_name, order_price, date_format(order_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S') as order_timestamp, order_status from mtime_order_t as o left join mtime_film_t as f on o.film_id = f.UUID left join mtime_field_t as field on o.field_id = field.UUID left join mtime_cinema_t as c on o.cinema_id = c.UUID where order_user = #{id}

select o.UUID ,film_name, begin_time, cinema_name, seats_name, order_price, unix_timestamp(order_time) as order_timestamp, order_status from mtime_order_t as o left join mtime_film_t as f on o.film_id = f.UUID left join mtime_field_t as field on o.field_id = field.UUID left join mtime_cinema_t as c on o.cinema_id = c.UUID where order_user = #{id} order by order_time desc limit 1;
select order_price from mtime_order_t where UUID = #{orderId}
